titleStmt.title: A declaration of His Highness the Lord Protector and the Parlam'ent [sic] of the Common-wealth of England, Scotland, & Ireland, for a day of solemn fasting & humiliation in the three nations.

Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.
